title: The "Chandrika" Polki Diamond Haaram: A Radiant Legacy
materials: 22K Gold setting with Uncut Polki Diamonds (approx. 25 carats). Hyderabadi Polish for a timeless luster. Each Polki diamond is meticulously selected for its unique character and brilliance.
features: This stunning Chandrika Haaram features a layered, cascading design. Each segment is crafted with floral motifs, evocative of traditional South Indian artistry. The Polki diamonds are set in a closed setting, showcasing their natural beauty. The central pendant boasts a larger, pear-shaped Polki, surrounded by smaller diamonds, creating a captivating focal point. Features an elaborate design inspired by vintage Hyderabad jewelry.
colors: Golden yellow (22K Gold) with the natural white brilliance of Polki Diamonds. Hints of light pink can be seen in some Polki Diamonds.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also a statement piece for upscale cultural events and black-tie affairs where you want to embody regal elegance.
description: This Chandrika Haaram is more than just a necklace; it's a piece of history. Crafted with authentic Polki diamonds and traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship, it embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry. The uncut Polki diamonds add a unique, natural charm, making it a truly one-of-a-kind piece. Its timeless design ensures it will be treasured for generations. Represents the 'Lakshmi Kataksham' for prosperity and good fortune.
